attributes.action: Abolish the toll charges for both the Mersey and Birkenhead tunnels.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It was stated at the time of the tunnels construction, that the toll charges would be abolished once the costs of their construction had been met. The construction costs of the tunnels were met decades ago, and yet the tolls are still in operation.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Abolish the toll charges for both the Mersey and Birkenhead tunnels."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15916.asp

Prime Minister's Office
